body:
Hello @TomAugspurger! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/compat/numpy/function.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/daab4620c16468d23afe4b41a15bbfbc33f9cfce/pandas/compat/numpy/function.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/generic.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/daab4620c16468d23afe4b41a15bbfbc33f9cfce/pandas/core/generic.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/series/test_analytics.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/daab4620c16468d23afe4b41a15bbfbc33f9cfce/pandas/tests/series/test_analytics.py) !

# [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/24356?src=pr&el=h1) Report

> The diff coverage is `81.81%`.

===========================================

- Misses       3991    29535    +25544
